data.comment: The match has started at John Smith's Stadium.
Goal! Josh Koroma gives Huddersfield a 1-0 lead in Huddersfield.
In the minute 21, Liam Palmer is replacing Julian Borner for Sheffield Wed at John Smith's Stadium.
Liam Palmer (Sheffield Wed) has received a yellow card from Keith Stroud.
Great finish from Isaac Mbenza to give Huddersfield a 2-0 lead.
In the minute 35, Huddersfield make their first substitution with Juninho Bacuna replacing Jonathan Hogg.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The away team replace Massimo Luongo with Joey Pelupessy.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Penalty! Keith Stroud points to the spot, great chance for Huddersfield...
Carlos Corberan is making the team's second substitution at John Smith's Stadium with Jaden Brown replacing Josh Koroma.
In the minute 71, At John Smith's Stadium, Kadeem Harris has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Huddersfield's Harry Toffolo has been booked in Huddersfield.
The away team have replaced Callum Paterson with Elias Kachunga. This is the third substitution made today by Tony Pulis.
In the minute 80, Jordan Rhodes is replacing Josh Windass for the away team.
Carlos Corberan (Huddersfield) is making a third substitution, with Alex Vallejo replacing Isaac Mbenza.
Carlos Corberan is making the team's fourth substitution at John Smith's Stadium with Danny Ward replacing Fraizer Campbell.
In the minute 85, Isaiah Brown is replacing Barry Bannan for Sheffield Wed at John Smith's Stadium.
Tom Lees is booked for the away team.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-0.
